content:
Sure, here are 15 Cantonese-style home cooked meal kit dishes that are quick and easy to prepare, use ingredients that can be shipped in an ice box, and encourage customers to explore new and interesting flavors and techniques:

1. 蒜茸牛油炒蝦仁 (Garlic Butter Shrimp)
2. 金沙脆皮雞 (Crispy Salted Egg Chicken)
3. 豉汁蒸魚 (Steamed Fish with Black Bean Sauce)
4. 酸辣湯 (Hot and Sour Soup)
5. 炒四季豆 (Stir-fried Green Beans)
6. 燒肉飯 (Roast Pork Rice Bowl)
7. 紅燒牛肉 (Braised Beef in Soy Sauce)
8. 菜脯蛋炒飯 (Egg Fried Rice with Preserved Vegetables)
9. 雞絲粥 (Chicken Congee with Ginger and Scallions)
10. 芝士焗蘑菇 (Baked Mushrooms with Cheese)
11. 咖哩牛肉飯 (Curry Beef Rice Bowl)
12. 香蒜蒸扇貝 (Garlic Steamed Scallops)
13. 肉鬆蛋炒飯 (Egg Fried Rice with Pork Floss)
14. 肉末炒蛋 (Stir-fried Eggs with Minced Pork)
15. 粉絲蒸肉餅 (Steamed Pork Patty with Vermicelli)

I hope these dish ideas fit your criteria and provide some inspiration for your meal kit service launch in Hong Kong!
